title: Depression - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/24/20
itunes:title: Depression - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/24/20
description:
George Noory and clinical psychologist Peter Breggin explore the major increase in American adults reporting signs of depression since the start of the pandemic, and ways to cope with the stress of everyday life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A discussion on the increase in adult depression during the COVID-19 pandemic.
